Olly Wiggins

Hi! My name is Olly. I’m a university student working in the music industry while also specialising in marketing, the web, film, and anything else that interests me. Check out what I’ve been up to below!

🖥

Digital Marketing for Metro Sound

Metro Sound is a electronic music label run by my uni. I keep the Instagram and Facebook pages fresh with upcoming events and marketing campaigns. I also tend to show up at the events to film.

💬

Digital Communications

SMS is the past. I help my university communicate using platforms like Freshchat, WhatsApp Business API and Apple Business Chat.

📨

Email Marketing

I design emails that probably end up in your Spam folder. My HTML and CSS knowledge helps here.

⌨️

Web Development

I didn’t use Wix to create this site.

Trust me, all of this is more interesting than it sounds.

DBS July 2019
